Enteringthetutorialstage.Text: Nice to meet you Player! I am Fairie! Are you ready to go on an adventure?
Don’t worry I will be here to assist you whenever we come across something worth noting!
Let’s start with the basics. You can use spellcodes to perform actions on the stage!

Inspectingthestage.Text: Hmm… looks like there’s an ice block that’s obstructing us from getting out of here.? Maybe an appropriate elemental attack would get rid of it?

Destroyingtheiceblock.Text: Great job! You managed to melt down the ice cube with a fireball attack. Remember, different elemental attacks affect different obstacles in different ways!.
Try to recognize a pattern in how elemental attacks affect certain obstacles

pickingupamaterial.Text: Wow look at that! You obtained a piece of metal! Maybe this is something we could use to our advantage!
